body.p: Kentucky farmer and soldier. Married to Sallie A. Reese. Father of S. F. Reese and Lillie A. A. Reese. Served as the colonel of the 45th Regiment of Kentucky Militia in Grayson County, Kentucky in 1863 and 1864.

bibl.p: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Litchfield Precinct, p. 81; W. Stephen McBride, “The Union Occupation of Munfordville, Kentucky, 1861-1865: A Narrative Summary,” (Lexington, Kentucky), 46-47.
